questions.question: What type of method is the Gauss-Seidel method?
In the Gauss-Seidel method, how are bus voltages updated?

answers.c: Sequentially one bus at a time

questions.question: Which criterion is typically used to determine convergence in the Gauss-Seidel method?
What is a common initial guess for bus voltages in the Gauss-Seidel method?:

answers.b: All set to 1.0 p.u. with 0 degrees angle
answers.c: All set to the maximum expected value

questions.question: Because of the nature of the power-flow bus data, nodal equations do not directly fit the linear-equation format, and power-flow equations are actually nonlinear.
